tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE EndangeredSpecies (
  species_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  species_name VARCHAR(50),
  species_type VARCHAR(50),
  pollution_level INT
)

CREATE TABLE ConservationGroups (
  group_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  group_name VARCHAR(50),
  location VARCHAR(50),
  contact_person VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE SpeciesConservation (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  species_id INT,
  group_id INT,
  conservation_status VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE EndangeredSpecies (
 id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 species_name VARCHAR(50),
 region VARCHAR(50),
 pollution_level FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE ConservationGroups (
 id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 group_name VARCHAR(50),
 location VARCHAR(50),
 contact_email VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE PollutionSources (
 id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 source_name VARCHAR(50),
 description TEXT,
 location VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE SpeciesImpact (
 id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 species_id INT,
 source_id INT,
 impact_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE EndangeredSpecies (
    species_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    species_name VARCHAR(100),
    conservation_status VARCHAR(50),
    pollution_threat VARCHAR(50)
)
